title: A qualitative exploration and a Fuzzy Delphi validation of high-risk scaffolding tasks and fatigue-related safety behavioural deviation among scaffolders
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Hanizah Mohd Yusoff, Pei Pei Heng, Mohamad Ridza Hj Illias, Saravanan Karrupayah, Mohd Anis Fadhli, Rozita Hod
